body_html: Talked to someone from one of the compiler teams. Sounds like it might be possible to compile against glibc libraries extracted from Ubuntu 14 on Ubuntu 16. But he did not recommend doing so. Will give it a try when I have some spare time and see how bad it is.

body: Talked to someone from one of the compiler teams. Sounds like it might be possible to compile against glibc libraries extracted from Ubuntu 14 on Ubuntu 16. But he did not recommend doing so. Will give it a try when I have some spare time and see how bad it is.
